description: Length of n-th run of digit 2 in A003137.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (Haskell)import Data.List (group)a030338 n = a030338_list !! (n-1)a030338_list = map length $ filter ((== 2) . head) $ group a003137_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 21 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
